mapper.select: SELECT G.GAME_NO,G.GAME_DATE,G.GAME_TIME,G.TEAM_A,G.TEAM_B,G.GAME_RESULT,P.MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION FROM MATCH_PREDICT P JOIN GAME G ON P.MEMBER_ID = G.MEMBER_ID

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, P.MATCH_PREDICT_NO, P.MATCH_PREDICT_DECISION, P.MATCH_PREDICT_STATUS, G.GAME_DATE, G.TEAM_A, G.TEAM_B FROM MATCH_PREDICT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN GAME G ON P.GAME_NO = G.GAME_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};
